attributes.action: Limit the cost of the Olympics to the £2.4 billion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As most if not all Government projects have spiraled out of control costs wise. We demand that the cos be contained within the 2.4 billion or less, including security if needed, or that any extra cost is found from other sources, for extra security from the countries demanding extra security.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
